thread.section_title: Dolphin Suites - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Not luxury but good
thread.title_full: Not luxury but good - Review of Dolphin Suites, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Gil1213
title: Not luxury but good
text:
African style hotel with a swimming pool and a nice covered terrasse as its restaurant. Staff is friendly, rooms are quite basic, with a noisy air conditioning.
It covers the loud outside sound that is not filtered by the windows.
The bathroom is small, with basic faucets, the water is from the roof tank: you'd rather not drink it.
The restaurant offers African and Indian food. It is a bit more expensive than in some other nice places around also because the prices on the menu don't include the VAT.
I appreciate a lot the thorough cleaning of outside furnitures that otherwise are quickly covered with dust.
The hotel has also a fitness room with rather old gear and a sauna that I had not tried.
Third time I stay at this hotel that is not a bad choice. The other better rated ones in this area are far more expensive.
